sen.j: 日本の軍事史（にほんのぐんじし）は、国内安定から長い封建的な戦いと帝国主義による海外遠征に特徴づけられる。
sen.e: Japanese military history is characterized by the long feudal battles inside the nation and the overseas expedition during the age of imperialism.
Japanese military history is characterized by the long feudal battles inside the nation and the overseas expedition during the age of imperialism.
Japanese military history is characterized by the long feudal battles inside the nation and the overseas expedition during the age of imperialism.

sen.j: 日本は第二次世界大戦で総力戦を経験、日本の陸海軍は壊滅的な損害を蒙り、日本本土はアメリカ軍に占領された。
sen.e: Japan experienced an all-out war in the Second World War in which its army and navy suffered disastrous damages, and Japan proper was occupied by the U.S. army.
Japan experienced an all-out war in the Second World War in which its army and navy suffered disastrous damages, and Japan proper was occupied by the U.S. army.

sen.j: それ以後、その国是を変え、他国に対する武力行使を禁じた。
sen.e: After that, it altered its national policy and banned the use of force against other nations.
